support.title: Help Center
support.subtitle: We're here to help
support.contactFormDesc: Have questions? Fill out the form and we'll respond as soon as possible.
support.yourRightsDesc: Under GDPR, you have full control over your personal data.
support.subject: Subject
support.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We'll respond as soon as possible.
support.errorMessage: Error sending message. Please try again later.
support.serviceUnavailable: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later or contact us directly.
support.exportDataDesc: Download a copy of all your personal data that we process.
support.eraseDataDesc: Request complete deletion of your personal data from our systems.
support.withdrawConsentDesc: Withdraw your consents to personal data processing.

export.title: Download my data
export.subtitle: Fill out the form to export your personal data.
export.name: Full name
export.allDataNotice: This is all the personal data you have provided to us and that we store in our system.

erase.title: Delete my data
erase.subtitle: Fill out the form to permanently delete your personal data.
erase.acknowledgement: I understand that data deletion is irreversible and may affect my ability to use services. I want to permanently delete all my personal data from the system.
erase.erasedDataTitle: According to your request, the following data has been deleted:
erase.retainedDataTitle: What has been retained (GDPR legal requirements):
erase.thankYou: Thank you for your understanding and trust.
erase.alreadyErasedMessage: Your data has already been deleted from our system. If you have questions, contact us through the support form.

withdraw.title: Withdraw consents
withdraw.subtitle: Complete data deletion takes up to 30 days.
withdraw.acknowledgement: I understand that withdrawing consents may affect my ability to use certain services and requires up to 30 days for complete processing.
withdraw.successMessage: Your consent for data processing for booking purposes has been withdrawn.
withdraw.noNewBookings: You will not be able to make new bookings
withdraw.essentialDataKept: We only retain essential data as required by law
withdraw.futureConsentNeeded: Future visits will require renewed consent
withdraw.eraseDataHint: If you want to completely delete your data, use the 'Delete my data' form.
withdraw.alreadyProcessedMessage: The last request is still being processed or has been completed. If you need to inform us additionally, contact us through the support form.
